name: Pistol Shooting Drills
description: Essential drills to improve accuracy, draw speed, and target transitions with a handgun.

cards.title: Draw and Fire Drill
cards.description: Developing quick draw and precision shooting under time constraints.
cards.bulletpoints: Grip stability, sight alignment, trigger control, rapid target acquisition
cards.summaryText: Win the draw by crushing grip, snapping sights on target, and pressing smooth shots before the timer buzzes.

cards.title: Failure-to-Stop Drill
cards.description: Engaging threats with precision shots to neutralize quickly.
cards.bulletpoints: Two shots to the torso, follow-up shot to the head, adjusting for target movement
cards.summaryText: Run failure-to-stop strings by double-tapping center mass, delivering a surgical head shot, and adjusting for target shifts mid-sequence.
